item.title: Rắn Cạp Đuôi + syw + Luciana Rizzo
item.description: ITR presents: 23 July, 2024 @ TV Studio Ost doors 19h30 startttt 20h00 Rắn Cạp Đuôi (free electronic noise rock / Sài Gòn) Rắn Cạp Đuôi is a collective of the Vietnamese artist Đỗ Tấn Sĩ, Phạm Thế Vũ, Zach Sch, Đỗ Hoàng Tuấn Anh, and Vuong Thien doing unexpected noise rock mayhem, glitched-out bracing DJ sets, captivating situanist performances and all that. They have released on Subtext Recordings and are part of Gãy collective from Sài Gòn.
